title: Talmudic miscellany
author: Gerondi, Jonah ben Abraham
description: Contents: 1) Talmud. Tamid, with commentary by Shemaiah of Troyes (ff. 1-11); 2) Mishnah. Middot with commentary by Shemaiah of Troyes (ff. 12-18); 3) Talmud. Meʻilah with a commentary (ff. 19-46); 4) Talmud. Arakhin with commentary by Rashi (ff. 47-113v); 5) Talmud. Minor tractates. Kallah (ff. 113v-116r); 6) Talmud. Minor tractates. Semaḥot (ff. 116r-128r); 7) Talmud Yerushalmi. Shekalim with commentary by Meshulam a student of David ben Kalonymos of Mainz (ff. 128v-158v); 8) Sefer ha-yirʼah by Jonah ben Abraham Gerondi (ff. 160-163); 9) Talmud. Meʻilah with commentary (ff. 164-176r); 10) Talmud Yerushalmi. Shekalim with commentary (ff. 177-202r); 11) Baraita de-melekhet ha-mishkan (ff. 203-206); 12) Talmud. Minor tractates. Soferim  (ff.207-217); 13) Hilkhot ʻavodah, after Maimonides's Mishneh Torah (ff. 218-230).
